attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To simply charge for such a bag is not the answer, 2p 5p 10p 50p per bag? will not stop them from being an eye saw on our landscapes.
Nor will it stop the deaths of hundreds of thousands of marine wildlife and other wildlife around the UK or the World for that matter.
Why are Plastic bags killing Dolphins, Turtles and other cetaceans?.
Visit our website for more information www.dolphincareuk.org

An astonishing 13billion free single-use plastic bags are dished out by Britain's High Street stores every year. 

Many dolphins find the bags as play things some dolphins think they are jelly fish.

But the horrible truth is, these bags will end up killing them.

Stop the Killing of Marine Mammals Now.
Save other Wildlife from a horrible death - Say NO to Plastic Carrier Bags.
Tell the Government to bring in, an Outright Ban.

Regards

Chris Lowes
Marine Mammal Medic (Bdmlr)
Founder of "Dolphin Care UK"

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/longlifebags/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
